ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: This R package can be used to generate artificial data conditionally on pre-specified (simulated or user-defined) relationships between the variables and/or observations. Each observation is drawn from a multivariate Normal distribution where the mean vector and covariance matrix reflect the desired relationships. Outputs can be used to evaluate the performances of variable selection, graphical modelling, or clustering approaches by comparing the true and estimated structures (B Bodinier et al (2021) <arXiv:2106.02521>).

This R package can be used to generate artificial data conditionally on pre-specified (simulated or user-defined) relationships between the variables and/or observations. Each observation is drawn from a multivariate Normal distribution where the mean vector and covariance matrix reflect the desired relationships. Outputs can be used to evaluate the performances of variable selection, graphical modelling, or clustering approaches by comparing the true and estimated structures (B Bodinier et al (2021) <arXiv:2106.02521>).

name: r-fake
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.5.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-fake
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/fake_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/fake/fake_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 398fe5c57ca148244beea14d211ae4d08fc2816f99b7492719ad83c04af5b9d9

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-rdpack
    - r-huge
    - r-igraph
    - r-withr >=2.4.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-rdpack
    - r-huge
    - r-igraph
    - r-withr >=2.4.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('fake')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('fake')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=fake
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: This R package can be used to generate artificial data conditionally on pre-specified (simulated or user-defined) relationships between the variables and/or observations. Each observation is drawn from a multivariate Normal distribution where the mean vector and covariance matrix reflect the desired relationships.
    Outputs can be used to evaluate the performances of variable selection, graphical modelling, or clustering approaches by comparing the true and estimated structures (B Bodinier et al (2021) <arXiv:2106.02521>).
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - barbarabodinier

# Package: fake
# Title: Flexible Data Simulation Using the Multivariate Normal Distribution
# Version: 1.3.0
# Date: 2022-12-08
# Author: Barbara Bodinier [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Barbara Bodinier <b.bodinier@imperial.ac.uk>
# Description: This R package can be used to generate artificial data conditionally on pre-specified (simulated or user-defined) relationships between the variables and/or observations. Each observation is drawn from a multivariate Normal distribution where the mean vector and covariance matrix reflect the desired relationships. Outputs can be used to evaluate the performances of variable selection, graphical modelling, or clustering approaches by comparing the true and estimated structures (B Bodinier et al (2021) <arXiv:2106.02521>).
# License: GPL (>= 3)
# Language: en-GB
# Encoding: UTF-8
# RoxygenNote: 7.2.0
# Imports: huge, igraph, MASS, Rdpack, withr (>= 2.4.0)
# Suggests: testthat (>= 3.0.0),
# Config/testthat/edition: 3
# RdMacros: Rdpack
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2022-12-08 19:17:13 UTC; barbara
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2022-12-09 11:40:02 UTC
